long_description: There's no need to leave Fido at home when you want to hit a rugged trail. REI 3-in. Dog Boots help protect your dog's paws from injury and boost his or her willingness to go farther. 3-dimensional articulated cuff follows the natural curve of a dog's ankle and paw for precise fit and comfort. Reprotek(R) high-mileage soles are flexible and give great traction. 500-denier Cordura(R) uppers are highly durable but won't restrict movement. Toe rands are reinforced with ballistic nylon. Hook-and-loop closures. To measure for size: Put a piece of paper under a paw while dog is standing and mark the paper on either side of the paw. Boots fit paws approximately 3 in. wide. Overstock.
short_description: There's no need to leave Fido at home when you want to hit a rugged trail. REI 3-in. Dog Boots help protect your dog's paws from injury and boost his or her willingness to go farther.
